creditline: Gift of The James Castle Collection, Boise, Idaho
description: recto: building with stairs(?) at R; small dark window with a small shrub below and dark tree to R; trees on horizon line at L; verso: gabled building with additional sections at R
medium: Soot and soot wash on tan found paper; double-sided drawing
provenance: The artist, Boise, Idaho; Estate of the artist, Boise, Idaho; given to MIA, 2007.
title: Untitled (Farmscape with outbuildings / Farmscape with shed and prominent tree)
